"Design a sustainable skyscraper that utilizes solar panels to power its elevators and HVAC systems."
"Create a smart home system for the building that allows residents to control various aspects of their living space using their smartphones or voice commands."
"Implement a green roof on top of the building to improve air quality, reduce stormwater runoff, and provide a natural habitat for wildlife."
"Integrate a rainwater harvesting system into the building's design to collect and store water for reuse in irrigation, toilet flushing, and other non-potable applications."

"Partner with local businesses and organizations to create a community garden on the rooftop of the building, providing fresh produce for residents and promoting sustainability and community engagement."
